name: Product Feed Manager- WooCommerce Product Feeds For Google Shopping, Facebook(Meta), Bing, & TikTok
author: Conversios

sections.description:
Product Feed Manager is the ultimate plugin to generate real-time WooCommerce product feeds using Content API for Google Shopping, Facebook (Meta), Bing, and TikTok. This powerful plugin helps WooCommerce store owners effortlessly create, manage, and sync product feeds across multiple platforms, ensuring your product data is always up-to-date and optimized for each channel.

Key Features

Why Choose Us for Product Feed?

✅ You can create product feeds in XML, CSV, TSV, and TXT formats to make sure they work well with many marketing channels.
✅ Use over 100 ready-made templates for about 200 countries to save time-making feeds.
✅ Creates custom fields like Brand, GTIN, Age-group, Gender, etc, so that you can generate accurate product feeds without any extra coding or plugins.
✅ Easily create and update product feeds for multiple platforms with Automated Product Feed Generation.
✅ Keep product data up-to-date across all channels with Real-Time Sync.
✅ Reach a wider audience by distributing products on Google Shopping, TikTok, Facebook, Bing, and other platforms with Multi-Channel Support.
✅ Scale your product feed management without limitations.
✅ Precisely target specific products for different campaigns with Advanced Filtering.
✅ Easily choose products for inclusion in feeds with Product Selection.
✅ Enhance functionality with seamless integration with popular plugins for WooCommerce with Compatibility with WooCommerce Plugins.
✅ Optimize product information for each platform with Category and Attribute Mapping.
✅ Provide additional product details with Custom Attribute Support.
✅ Efficiently handle extensive product catalogs with Large-Scale Product Management.
✅ Navigate and manage easily with a User-Friendly Interface.
✅ Quickly identify issues and monitor product performance with Real-Time Product Approval Status.
✅ Update your products using auto update interval.
✅ Free setup and audit.

Setup and Configuration

Initial Setup

After installation, navigate to the plugin settings in your WordPress dashboard. Follow the on-screen instructions to connect your accounts for Google Shopping, Facebook (Meta), Bing, and TikTok.

Creating a Feed

  1. Go to the Product Feeds tab.
  2. Select the desired platform (Google Shopping, Facebook, Bing, TikTok).
  3. Choose the products you want to include.
  4. Configure feed settings (e.g., format, custom fields).
  5. Click Generate Feed.

Support and Contact Information

For any issues or questions, visit our Support Page or email us at support@conversios.io.

Documentation and Tutorials

For more detailed documentation and video tutorials, visit our Documentation Page.

Testimonials

“This plugin has streamlined our product feed management across multiple platforms. Highly recommended!” – A Happy User
sections.installation:
1. Install via WordPress Dashboard:

    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
    • Search for Product Feed Manager.
    • Click Install Now, then Activate.

  2. Manual Installation:

    • Download the plugin ZIP file.
    • Navigate to Plugins > Add New in your WordPress admin.
    • Click Upload Plugin and choose the downloaded file.
    • Click Install Now, then Activate.
sections.faq:
Q: Is this plugin compatible with other WooCommerce plugins?

A: Yes, it integrates seamlessly with popular WooCommerce plugins for enhanced functionality.

Q: Can I create feeds for platforms not listed?

A: Yes, the plugin supports custom feed generation for other platforms using XML, CSV, TSV, and TXT formats.

Q: How often does the plugin update the product feeds?

A: The plugin automatically updates feeds at set intervals. You can customize the auto-update intervals in the settings.

Q: Is there a limit to the number of products I can include in a feed?

A: No, the plugin is designed to handle large-scale product management without limitations.

Q: Can I schedule feed generation for specific times?

A: Yes, you can schedule feed generation to run at specific times to align with your marketing strategies.

Q: What if my feed gets disapproved by Google or Facebook?

A: Use the real-time product approval status feature to quickly identify and resolve issues that could cause disapproval.

Q: Does the plugin support multiple languages and currencies?

A: Yes, the plugin supports multiple languages and currencies, making it ideal for global Ecommerce.
sections.changelog:
4.0.0 – 21/08/2024

  • New UI/UX
  • Introducing XML/CSV/TSV file creation for Product Feed with more than 100 channels.

3.0.1 – 27/05/2024

  • Added FaceBook Auth in Onboarding flow.
  • New FaceBook Catalog Feed channel.
  • Added Feed Creation capability with FaceBook Catalog.

3.0.0 – 15/02/2024

  • We’re thrilled to announce a significant update, marking one of our major releases this year. This update brings a host of new features and improvements:
  • A completely redesigned dashboard to simplify the onboarding process for our users.
  • New, user-friendly setup wizards for various functionalities, including 1. Product Feed Management for Google Shopping, TikTok, and Facebook,2. Campaign Management for Google Shopping.
  • Enhanced flexibility in creating product feeds with a variety of inventory selection options.
  • The ability to launch Performance Max campaigns using your product feeds.
  • Options to create campaigns for all WooCommerce products or specific products based on filters.
  • The introduction of advanced paid plans designed for our pro users.

2.0.2 – 12/10/2023

  • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.1 – 29/09/2023

  • Minor bug fixes.

2.0.0 – 28/09/2023

  • Introducing product sync feature for TikTok catalog.
  • Introducing Sper Feed, Feed all your products in a single click.
  • Step by Step guidance for new as well as existing users
  • Enhanced the existing features

1.1.3 – 14/06/2023

  • Minor fixes & enhancements.

1.1.2 – 31/05/2023

  • Minor fixes & enhancements.
  • Added compatibility with wpc brand plugin.

1.1.1 – 18/05/2023

  • Minor bug fix.

1.1.0 – 24/04/2023

  • Feature to Create and manage feeds in product sync process.
  • Independent auto-sync feature for the feeds.
  • Advance filters for selecting desired products in product feed process.
  • Added Search capability for products and feeds.
  • Capability to manage your WooCommerce product category and other attribute mappings from configuration screen.
  • Minor fixes and Enhancements in product sync to google merchant center.

1.0.3 – 06/02/2023

  • Few improvements and security enhancements.

1.0.2 – 02/02/2023

  • In this release, with the addition of filter capability in product feed, functions like searching and applying multiple filters will now be possible for product lists for Google merchant center. For improved user experience, the product listing page will also feature a new UI interface.
  • We have also made Minor adjustments and enhancements.

1.0.1 – 17/01/2023

  • In this release, we have fixed few bugs which have improved product feed functionality and made certain enhancements to product listing page.

1.0.0 – 10/01/2023

  • Initial release of Product Feed Manager for WooCommerce.
  • Users will be able to sync WooCommerce products to Google Merchant Center without any hassle of creating XML feed files. Powerful and real-time Google powered Content API integration for product feed management.
  • Get real-time approval status for your products in the Dashboard.
  • Get error descriptions for disapproved products in the Dashboard.
  • Schedule interval for automatic product updates for Google Shopping.
  • Create product feed for 100000+ effortlessly.
  • API based Google Merchant Center account management (Site verification. Domain claim, GMC account creation)
